name: Surefire Javelin
effect_desc1: Increases damage dealt by 1% of the target's Max Health when attacking a single target
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt by 2% of the target's Max Health when attacking a single target

name: Talisman of Animosities
effect_desc1: +5% Priority to the caster when using a single-target skill
effect_desc4: +10% Priority to the caster when using a single-target skill

name: Heartunder's Blade
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to inflict Burned for 2 turn(s) when attacking a single target
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to inflict Burned for 2 turn(s) when attacking a single target

name: Fire Fists
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to reduce the cooldown of an ultimate skill by 1 turn when killing an enemy
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to reduce the cooldown of an ultimate skill by 1 turn when killing an enemy

name: Royal Stinger
effect_desc1: Heals the ally with the lowest Health by 15% when using a burst skill
effect_desc4: Heals the ally with the lowest Health by 30% when using a burst skill

name: Twin B
effect_desc1: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 1% each time when perfoming an action (max 10 stacks)
effect_desc4: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 2% each time when perfoming an action (max 10 stacks)

name: Force Field Generator
effect_desc1: Grants a barrier to the caster equal to 10% of the caster's Max Health for 2 turn(s) when performing an action
effect_desc4: Grants a barrier to the caster equal to 20% of the caster's Max Health for 2 turn(s) when performing an action

name: Rampaging Caracal
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to inflict Marked for 1 turn(s) when attacking a single target
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to inflict Marked for 1 turn(s) when attacking a single target

name: Noblewoman's Guile
effect_desc1: Has a 35% chance to inflict Bleeding on all target for 1 run(s) when attacking all enemies
effect_desc4: Has a 70% chance to inflict Bleeding on all target for 1 run(s) when attacking all enemies

name: Emblem of Dominance
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to increase the Defense of all allies by 50% for 1 turn(s) when using a burst skill
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to increase the Defense of all allies by 50% for 1 turn(s) when using a burst skill

name: Violent Sledgehammer
effect_desc1: Increases damage dealt proportionnal to the caster's missing Health (Max 30%)
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt proportionnal to the caster's missing Health (Max 60%)

name: Token of the Supreme Witch
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to remove 1 debuff from the caster when performing an action
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to remove 1 debuff from the caster when performing an action

name: Meteor Mashers
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to increase Evasion by 3% when scoring a critical hit (max 5 stacks)
effect_desc4: Has a 50% chance to increase Evasion by 6% when scoring a critical hit (max 5 stacks)

name: Thumping Knuckle Dusters
effect_desc1: Increases damage by 5% of the target's Attack when attacking
effect_desc4: Increases damage by 10% of the target's Attack when attacking

name: Iron Messiah
effect_desc1: When attacking a single target, grants a barrier equal to 15% of Max Health to the ally with the lowest Health for 1 turn(s)
effect_desc4: When attacking a single target, grants a barrier equal to 30% of Max Health to the ally with the lowest Health for 1 turn(s)

name: Snow-white Embrace
effect_desc1: +20% damage dealth to enemies when at Max Health
effect_desc4: +40% damage dealth to enemies when at Max Health

name: God Hand Crush
effect_desc1: Before attacking, has a 50% chance to reduce Action Points of the target by 15 (Excluding Skill Chains and Dual Attacks)
effect_desc4: Before attacking, has a 100% chance to reduce Action Points of the target by 15 (Excluding Skill Chains and Dual Attacks)

name: Legacy of the Dream
effect_desc1: Has a 30% chance to reduce all skill cooldowns by 1 turn when using a basic attack (Excluding Burst)
effect_desc4: Has a 60% chance to reduce all skill cooldowns by 1 turn when using a basic attack (Excluding Burst)

name: Last Hope
effect_desc1: Increases damage dealt of basic attacks by 10% (Excluding Burst)
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt of basic attacks by 20% (Excluding Burst)

name: Barrage of Truth
effect_desc1: Has a 6% chance to grant extra turn when using a single-target skill
effect_desc4: Has a 12% chance to grant extra turn when using a single-target skill

name: Phantasm Necrosis
effect_desc1: Reduces Speed of the wielder by 30% and reduces damage taken / increases Counterattack chance proportional to missing Health (Max: 10%/10%)
effect_desc4: Reduces Speed of the wielder by 30% and reduces damage taken / increases Counterattack chance proportional to missing Health (Max: 20%/20%)

name: Exquisite Death
effect_desc1: Increases damage dealt by allies proportional to the Defense of the wielder (Excluding the wielder)
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt by allies proportional to the Defense of the wielder (Excluding the wielder)

name: Immortal Pride
effect_desc1: Increases the healing received by allies by 5%
effect_desc4: Increases the healing received by allies by 10%

effect_desc4: Has a 30% chance to inflict Stunned for 1 turn when attacking a single target

name: Fierce Soloist

effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to grant Increased Speed to the wielder for 1 turn after using a non-attack skill

name: Adventurer's Sword

effect_desc4: Has a 30% chance to increase Penetration for 1 turn after taking an action

effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to grant increased Defense for 1 turn after using a Single Target skill (Activated only once every 2 turns)

effect_desc4: Has a 30% chance to inflict Taunted on the target for 1 turn after attacking a single target

effect_desc4: When using an attack that targets all enemies, increases damage dealt by 20%

effect_desc4: Grants Stealth to the ally with the lowest Health for 1 turn after using a Burst Skill (Activated only once every 1 turn(s))

name: Gorgon's Wrath [Striker]

effect_desc4: When defeating an enemy, has a 100% chance to grant increased Attack for 1 turn

effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt by Counterattack by 50%

effect_desc4: Extends duration of buffs granted to the wearer by 1 turn after using an attack that targets all enemies (Activated once every 1 turn(s))

effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to grant increased Accuracy for 1 turn after using Burst Skill

effect_desc4: Increases Priority by 20% after using a non-attack skill (Activated only once every 2 turns)
